thread.title: Iridescent Home Decor for Fall
thread.title_full: Iridescent Home Decor for Fall - Vogue

author: Virginia Van Zanten
title: Iridescent Home Decor for Fall
text: Iridescence seems better fit for the world of party decorations and nail polish, but a new crop of modern furniture designs is making us take a second look for the home and casting vintage finds like carnival glass in a new light. Whether itâ€™s glass, copper, or even laminated card stock, these statement-making, slightly out-of-this-world pieces have us intrigued. Above, 12 fun finds .
